Name: Limon
Review Text: Food was very pleasant and it is a good place if you need a fancier kitchen. Generous portions as well 😃 Service could have been a bit faster, but we had a good red merlot to keep us company.

Name: Limon
Review Text: Cozy spot right across Amsterdam-South Station. Perfect for a lunch break. Variety of food and drinks options, all come with lots of garnish.  Staff was also very friendly. Would recommend!

Name: Limon
Review Text: Located in a very beutyful contemporary area of Amsterdam near the South Station. This restaurant is good , we had steak with potato muffins... something special. The steak was very good quality. The service kind. It is possible to sit outside in a quite area with view to the nice buildings.

Name: Limon
Review Text: Great atmosphere and honest food

Name: Limon
Review Text: 2nd time visiting. Nice place. Was busy when we visited on a Thursday evening. Hadn't booked but they managed to squeeze us in. Small spots in some areas so be prepared :-) …

Name: Limon
Review Text: Food was good and service was quick. Downstairs they have a bar with music if you prefer to have a drink and dance ;)

Name: Limon
Review Text:
They have the best burger and mojito
Very friendly and welcoming.. Highly recommended

Name: Limon
Review Text: Excellent food, fast and friendly service, nicely varied menu. Ideal because of Q park just across the street, so no losing time on finding a parking spot.

Name: Limon
Review Text: Awful experience. The kitchen close at 21h, so no proper food after that. The waiters are so impatient to get home that they take half of your order. We came with a dog and he had a bowl of water (that’s why I put 2 stars).  We had super pricy random finger food at the end. Nice design (Amsterdam south), but terrible service.

Name: Limon
Review Text: We had a very pleasent friday date/dinner at Limon. We have started with delicious oesters and sashimi paired with spanish verdejo wine suggested and main dish (deer steak and rib-eye) to go with italian nero d'avola red wine was truly …

Name: Limon
Review Text:
They have the best burger and mojito
Very friendly and welcoming.. Highly recommended

Name: Limon
Review Text: Nice bar at the Zuidas. Prices are nothing special but interior is quite adventurous and interesting. They don't have ijwit, which is an absolute shame. The cava is nice though.

Name: Limon
Review Text:
We had an amazing dinner.
Great presentation, high quality and also amazing red wines!

Review Text: Very good place to have a drink with snack

Name: Limon
Review Text: Nice service, good cocktails​. Cool garden outside and great seating outside on a sunny day!

Name: Limon

Review Text: Unfortunately I can't rate the food, as the unprofessional 'service' was too disappointing to even give it a try. I've been on touch with Limon about a group lunch (20pax) I wanted to organize and, although I initially received quite …

Name: Limon
Review Text: Delicate atmosphere, good selection of music (perfect volume), nice staff and nice people. Definitely recommended for those looking for a few after-work drinks or a nice evening with loved ones.

Name: Limon
Review Text: It has become a favourite place to go while here. Staff are friendly, food and drinks are good. Very relaxed with good music. Open until late. Alone, on a date, with colleagues, or with friends...all OK!

Name: Limon
Review Text: Great, polite stuff. Food was delicious, we had some great wines as well. Slightly overpriced, but that's because of the area I suppose.

Name: Limon
Review Text: Top location, very nice inside and outside terras. Enjoyed today at the BBQ special!

Name: Limon
Review Text: Delicious food and great service! Highly recommend. We had burgers, pasta with vongole and a selection of mixed desserts and everything was excellent

Name: Limon
Review Text: Good food, very relaxed atmosphere. Was alone there on a business trip and the staff was super friendly. Definitely a recommendation

Name: Limon
Review Text: Cute combination of a hip bar, hangout and restaurant. Good place to retreat to after work or to have diner. Worth visiting!

Name: Limon
Review Text: Limon is a bar in the midst of Amsterdam Zuid. There are chain of bar and restaurant in this area and each of them are comparable to one another leaving couple of them aside. Limon has a good variety of starters and all varieties of beers, wines and hot drinks. They have limited cocktails though.

Name: Limon
Review Text: Great little lunch spot.  Broodjes were tasty.  Took multiple people to figure out how to pay by credit card which was a bit silly but otherwise fun.

Name: Limon
Review Text: More than 40 minutes waiting for my dish, better not go here if you have less than 2 hours lunch break. Food is good but not worth the waiting time.

Name: Limon
Review Text: Nice spot for lunch. Loved the chicken avocado sandwich. Chairs not very comfortable though 😖

Name: Limon
Review Text: Hip - for zuidas, friendly enough service, seemingly less crowded than other zuidas "hot spots", OK beer selection, terrible music. I'd give it 3,5 stars if I could.

Name: Limon
Review Text: Nice bar, with friendly waitress. The restaurant is also really good, the Chef cooks with "love".
